title: Return of Reggie Watts (Comedian, actor, Late Late Show)
description:
The music man is back! Reggie Watts is an incredible comedian and musician. He's recorded several comedy specials, collaborated with countless musicians, and is currently the band leader for "The Late, Late Show with James Corden".   Reggie also owns 3 Porsches and has a deep appreciation for technology, cars, and driving. 

We talk about what old cars he's into and the first mod he'll do; what posters were on his wall; his first NASCAR experience; his advice to performers; the car he wished he hadn't sold; and more! 
 

Recorded February 28, 2022
